website_summaries.verdict: Nokia's lovely Lumia 925 delivers a high-end Windows Phone experience, but camera snobs with deep pockets should hold out for AT&T's Lumia 1020.
pros: Nokia's Lumia 925 has a sleek, slim, partially aluminum build
Its camera takes great shots, especially in low light conditions, and the LTE smartphone comes in at an affordable price
cons: The Lumia 925 is a little wide and squat, and sharp corners diminish handheld comfort
T-Mobile's version has 16GB of storage instead of 32GB

customer_reviews.title: So glad to get rid of iphone
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone. Always been a nokia phone fan but they lost out with their OS. Windows 8 phone seems to have fixed the problem. It is smoother and easier to use especially for work that my i"toy"phone. I have not found a problem in the apps department at all why does it matter if iphone has 1000 flashlight apps and windows 8 only has 100? All the ones I need and used on the iphone I have found for windows 8phone and having office is extremely useful.
customer_reviews.author: games

customer_reviews.title: Premium smartphone at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: The Nokia Lumia 925 was one of the first Windows Phone handsets to showcase a combination of beauty and capability... Outfitting this smartphone with a powerful 8.7MP OIS camera allows the user to capture amazing photos even in low light.. Even though Nokia has since released the Lumia 930 and Lumia 830, which build on its design, I still find the Lumia 925 to be one of the best designed Lumia smartphones in the market
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what i thought i was getting
customer_reviews.text: not at all happy i have had this for about 2ws or less and the camera has stopped working and it will not support the update to messenger even though it says it has the minimum system requirement for it I bought this because i really liked my last nokia and it supports windows but now when i get the money to replace it it won't be with this brand
customer_reviews.author: A.Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone to replace one just like it that was lost
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to replace one just like it that was lost. It has some features that my old 925 didn't have which I like. The screen did freeze after 4 days, but that resolved as soon as the battery died. Hasn't freezed since. The new features take some time getting used to, but I am navigating the phone fairly well now. My carrier is TMobile and the phone came preloaded with a bunch of ATT junk that I had to uninstall, but no serious issues.
customer_reviews.author: James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Not LTE compatible
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a month of use and now it wont charge.
customer_reviews.author: brianne varner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition phone
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition phone. It has some quirks working on AT&T being the international version. No really issues, but takes a bit more setup time and things like SoftCard only work currently on AT&T branded phone.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McCullough

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this phone but at the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this phone but at the end of the day, I will be switching to Android. This phone is not compatible with 4G LTE. It is only running HSPA. The internet is slow, I have terrible signal. Also, the GPS does not work well on this phone whereas my roommate's phone (who also has Lumia 925) runs lightning fast with every program. I think it's just buying an unlock phone from this dealer that makes me really unhappy and dissatisfied. I contacted the seller but no responses whatsoever. Go get a different phone or buy this type of phone from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Guan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best phone ever. It is too bad it is no longer being made.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Bannon

customer_reviews.title: And it looked really good too. However
customer_reviews.text: I was excited getting this phone. And it looked really good too. However, after only 4 - 5 weeks, my experience hasn't been as positive. It turns out I got a defective and only discovered when I started using the phone back in my home country; I can't hear calls and therefore need to use the speaker function. The battery also needs to be charged about twice a day. I've had more value using my Lumia 510 for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put it away
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular piece of electronics. Everything flows nicely, looks great, is very intuitive. The camera is just great, the editing capability for the pictures hit the right line of not too complex but still powerful enough. All smart phone functionalities work great, office even better as in Android. Not too manz apps out there yet, and batterz run time should be longer. Still the best phone I have ever had (including an Iphone and several Android ones)
customer_reviews.author: Ulrich Ehlert

customer_reviews.title: they look horrible on the phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is basic for calls and messages. If you download any apps, they look horrible on the phone. The battery is gone in a flash and even if you close the apps the battery still dies. I don't advise people who watches videos or constantly use their phone to buy it. Its not worth it, just get another android phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michell E.

customer_reviews.title: Feeling cheated
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new phone and it does not look brand new. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: C.Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures in low lighting.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best window smartphone out there. I like the tiles look. LOVE the camera! It takes very nice pictures in low lighting.
customer_reviews.author: VeeYaa

customer_reviews.title: This phone could not be unlocked! In fact, ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone could not be unlocked! In fact, my carrier T Mobile, said the item was flagged and should be returned. Very disappointing! I was just grateful to get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone. Bad Charger
customer_reviews.text: Love the phone but unfortunately when I recieved the package it came with a crappy charger didnt even plug into the phone. Amazon was nice enough to refund me partially but besides that I love the phone and it matches the description perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it's the best Nokia phone I have used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mehr

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: SOLID BUILT WORKS REAL GOOD. TOO BAD NOT MORE APPS FOR PHONE
customer_reviews.author: dizzkid

customer_reviews.title: Love it to bits
customer_reviews.text: Love it to bits, had it now for a few months and has never acted up or failed me. Now with the new update which includes cortana the phone just keeps getting stronger. The built quality and camera is really what sold it for me. Would Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Faes

customer_reviews.title: smartphones
customer_reviews.text: Yes this phone is great really smooth... Thanks amazon and by extension wireless hub... Really great service and really nice and new products no second hand stuff...
customer_reviews.author: sano

customer_reviews.title: I would love to hear some advice or help from the seller ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this phone for about 2 months and the baterry is running out very fast something around 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Katerina Baslova

customer_reviews.title: the best phone I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: So far, the best phone I've ever owned. It does everything that I need.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!...
customer_reviews.text: Product quality, in good condition and fast delivery, satisfied, thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: CARLOS ROBLEDO

customer_reviews.title: FASTEST PHONE IVE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: Never going back to Android...only con is battery life other this is a great phone needs more aps but has almost everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Telvin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very fast. brand new phone. work in full function. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, Nokia and Microsoft did a great job for a good price. beautiful, well finished, quick. I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: emmlemaudit

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I expected from the phone as described and priced very well. Only feedback to the reseller is to offer more quicker options to ship. I needed this much sooner than it was shipped, but no options were offered. other than that, good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: Gets 1 missing star because it has no memory card slot. SIM only. The camera is very nice and intelligent. The scrolling, page open / close controls are easy, and wifi and Bluetooth are great.
customer_reviews.author: Yazzidawg

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The phone is getting hot even when I have only used it for a short period of time. Need to return order. I have had several Lumia phones & when they get hot like that, the battery is bad & starts messing everything up on phone. The batteries cannot be replaced & in my opinion the phone was not in good working condition. I also do not believe that I should have to pay a restocking fee. If I am not charged a restocking fee, I will give you a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Phone is not unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for so long to get this NOkia, but I can't use it, Because the phone is locked, even try to unlock with several cell phone web sites and still can't use my phone
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Macias

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Unlocked and works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice product! Unlocked and works well. Fell like 10 inches and got a chip on the screen which then cracked. (lucky me) so be careful not to drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer1010

customer_reviews.title: Technology is terrible. For example
customer_reviews.text: Just want to try out a windows phone. Technology is terrible. For example, one setting for volume, you can't control voice volume without affecting ring volume or notification volume. There is no quick activation for for silent mode or airplane mode. It takes a long time to get a connection from no connection.. for example going out of a subway. The navigation app is terrible. The settings interface is not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: DT.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe someone more tech savvy would like it.
customer_reviews.text: I can figure out a cell phone just fine but this is so feature heavy that it's confusing. I don't run a business from my phone, I'm not a photographer, and I don't need social media sites updating every time someone blinks. If you do, great, it's got a nice UI, ever updating live tiles, office apps, and three different cameras. It's just too convoluted for me.
customer_reviews.author: K.J.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Lumia 925
customer_reviews.text: I love my Lumia 925. The phone is unlocked as described, BUT it is NOT factory unlocked. It was originally locked to AT&T and when powered on, the AT&T logo shows. The phone comes preinstalled with AT&T programs, but that is not a problem, I have uninstalled them. I have updated the phone to Lumia Cyan firmware and works pretty nice. I love it, works fast.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Moralez

customer_reviews.title: Phone seems to be network unlocked!
customer_reviews.text: Note that this item looks like it was an open box or returned soon after first purchase. The phone looks brand new though with no visible signs of ware. After updating the phone to Windows 8.1 and letting all the apps update which took about an hour or so, the phone is fantastic! its connecting to AT&T LTE / 4G perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: MatthewATH

customer_reviews.title: Fast, but battery not great.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this phone is really fast, even with the new Windows 10 Mobile, which is a great improvement over 8.1, way better than my previous 635 and 521 Lumias. However, the battery is just horrible. It probably only gave me from 2 to 3 hours of screen time surfing the web.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Even though Windows Phone 8 still has a lot of way to go, it's really a phone tan I can trust. It's stable, fast, fluid, and integrates all my Facebook, Outlook, Google and Twitter accounts. You have to go through the learning curve to squeeze out all it's potential. Regarding to the cell phone, I always have good signal reception, I only had to put my micro-SIM card inside (my company is Movistar, México) and automatically I was having 4G and my phone line back. It's a solid phone. The quality of the photos is amazing. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hector S.

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for my small Filipino hands
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't a TMo branded phone, maybe thats why it wouldnt work with my SIM card and my data plan. Wifi works as it should. It is a top quality phone. Win10 OS is so simple and powerful to use. The size is perfect for my small Filipino hands.
customer_reviews.author: LarryLMedina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone stopped working 5 days after a new activation.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Good phone, but buy it new or actually refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, was pretty beat up beyond what the description lead me to believe, the box was from Asia, so setting it up for english was fun... Also the camera appears to be defective at times, takes solid white photos.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Really good phone. Battery seems running out quire fast nowadays
customer_reviews.text: Using this Nokia 925 for last 20 months. Really good phone. Battery seems running out quire fast nowadays. I recommend this
customer_reviews.author: BOBY MATHEW

customer_reviews.title: Within one month of use this mobile is dead. ...
customer_reviews.text: Within one month of use this mobile is dead. Nokia are not providing any kind of warranty and support. The repairing cost is almost equivalent to new mobile. I have lost 317 USD in this.
customer_reviews.author: John Justin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone! I got a 32gb special edition
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone! I got a 32gb special edition, i bought it for my girlfriend, she was doubting about windows phone but she loves the simplicity and built quality of a Nokia phone.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Avila

customer_reviews.title: like it put i will keep my android phone
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice device good camera very nice screen the system is fast and responsive Put the lack of memory card is problem And the store is behind Apple and Google So I will keep my htc the primary phone and this one the secondary I hope I change my mind after the update to win 10
customer_reviews.author: ashraf

customer_reviews.title: DAMN FAST and GOOD QUALITY Material!
customer_reviews.text: Oh man! This phone is fast. Really fast. Im an android fan but damn lag! Couldnt stand it no more. This take a day or two getting use to. I m sticking to Windows.
customer_reviews.author: Diegote

customer_reviews.title: Died within 3 Months!  It's only 4 days past return window too!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this new phone in November 2016. It died today 2/4/17. It won't charge or turn on. I maintained it meticulously in a case and treated it with TLC.
customer_reviews.author: badger-tech

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Got this used through an amazon seller and I was very pleased with the quality for the price. I love this phone's camera!
customer_reviews.author: E. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone.
customer_reviews.text: Love this new phone. The only problem I have come across is that I found out there is an updated for it but I can't get it to download.
customer_reviews.author: c.wallace

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it but you might as well go for the Icon 930.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Best Nokia
customer_reviews.text: Best Nokia in the market, and now with call and sms blocking features, this phone, makes any phone wish it didn't exist
customer_reviews.author: Nsilu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone no problems better than android and ios i will recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob.t.kariampally

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone, but make sure you realize that this "International version" won't get 4G I'm loving the windows phone operating system. It's not as popular as IOS or Android, but it works great. I love that it syncs right up with MS Outlook and/or windows computers without having to go through some corky iTunes or Google program. I've tried many phones of all types, and this one has a beautiful screen, fast speeds, good reception, and sound quality, and it seems to be really durable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 920 with this phone; wanted to share my internet and the locked 920 wouldn't allow it. I was able to share the connection with this phone with no problems. Downloaded the Spanish keyboard just in case but didn't need it. The phone updated pretty quick with no problems, and I am quite happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Phone...
customer_reviews.text: For the past 10 years I was a HTC crazy. I had a dozen. I do not regret the change! For the firat time I see a product that had not just tech put in it, but it was carefully crafted and also very well designed. It is not perfect yet! as technology has it limitations still. The Nokia Apps gives some edge to it, and i am in love with it... Can't stop exploring... Nokia has given WP a bit of more salt. If you are not yet a WP person, just try this beauty and you will see...
customer_reviews.author: Osias Pinheiro de Castro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the new update. but I love the phone
customer_reviews.author: Melina Abarca

customer_reviews.title: But will cool down if you are not using it
customer_reviews.text: Very hot if you use the phone. But will cool down if you are not using it. When charging, it is hot too. Cannot accept that. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Huilin Z.

customer_reviews.title: good phone, bad applications support
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone! Sad there are no good apps for it... What I needed, wasn't available
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Aulestia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for you I got cancer from this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nokia Lumia 925 (RM-893) 4G LTE Windows 8 Smartphone GSM Unlocked

specifications.OS: Microsoft Windows Phone 8, upgradeable to v8.1
specifications.Other camera features: Primary: 8 MP, 3264 x 2448 pixels, Carl Zeiss optics, optical image stabilization, autofocus, dual-LED flash, 1/3'' sensor size, PureView technology, geo-tagging, touch focus, Video 1080p@30fps, optical stabilization|Secondary: 1.3 MP, 720p@30fps
